title: The Cat in the Hat
author: Dr. Seuss
description: Join the Cat in the Hat as he stirs up some mischief and fun in this classic children's book.

title: Where the Wild Things Are
author: Maurice Sendak
description: Follow Max on his wild and imaginative adventure to a land of monsters in this beloved classic.

title: Goodnight Moon
author: Margaret Wise Brown
description: Say goodnight to all the familiar objects in this classic bedtime book and drift off to sleep.
